mapper.select: select * from video where vtitle like '%${title}%' or scrname like '%${title}%'
select * from video order by uptime desc;
select * from video order by looknum+0 desc;
mapper.insert: insert into video ( vid, vtitle, vsrc, picsrc, descript, uptime, looknum, goodnum, scrid, state, scrname ) values ( #{vid}, #{vtitle}, #{vsrc}, #{picsrc}, #{descript}, #{uptime}, #{looknum}, #{goodnum}, #{scrid}, #{state}, #{scrname} );
mapper.update: update video set looknum=#{looknum}+1+0 where vid=#{vid}
